name: Cronos Cloner (VR)
description:
Cronos Cloner is a fast paced butterfly effect game.

Stacked against impossible odds in a shootout... But don't worry!  We can just bring you back in time a little bit so you can TRY AGAIN, do yourself a favor though and try to not mess up the continuum too badly!

Any time you "die" in the fight you are brought back to the beginning of the fight, where you will fight alongside the previous version(s) of yourself!

Known Bugs:

  •  Avatar lags behind by 2 frames
  • Extra cursor in the floor for no reason

OculusVR - Fully Supported

SteamVR - Untested (should work though!... probably?)
